# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Cceates a new segment option using the value you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: An unsigned integer that represents a specific segment option.
title: init(rawValue:)
